name: pi-api-hub
description: API Middleware and MCP Server for HubSpot and Anthropic APIs

scripts.mcp:setup-claude: node -e "const MCPClientConfig = require('./helpers/mcp-client-config'); const c = new MCPClientConfig(); c.generateConfig('claude_desktop', c.configs.claude_desktop).then(config => c.mergeConfig('claude_desktop', config)).then(config => c.writeConfig('claude_desktop', config)).then(() => console.log('✅ Claude Desktop MCP setup complete! Restart Claude Desktop to see HubSpot tools.')).catch(console.error);"
scripts.mcp:setup-cursor: node -e "const MCPClientConfig = require('./helpers/mcp-client-config'); const c = new MCPClientConfig(); c.generateConfig('cursor', c.configs.cursor).then(config => c.mergeConfig('cursor', config)).then(config => c.writeConfig('cursor', config)).then(() => console.log('✅ Cursor MCP setup complete! Restart Cursor to see HubSpot tools.')).catch(console.error);"
scripts.mcp:status: node -e "const MCPClientConfig = require('./helpers/mcp-client-config'); const c = new MCPClientConfig(); c.getStatus().then(status => console.log(JSON.stringify(status, null, 2))).catch(console.error);"
scripts.mcp:env-template: node -e "const MCPClientConfig = require('./helpers/mcp-client-config'); const c = new MCPClientConfig(); console.log(c.generateEnvTemplate());"
